title: Looking for the 3 T206 Nap Lajoie's
author: HOF Yankees

posts.post_title: Looking for the 3 T206 Nap Lajoie's
posts.post_content:
Throwing, Portrait, and With bat, PSA or SGC 1-2 grade, I prefer nice eye appeal with little to no creases or paper loss front and back. Back wise, doesn't matter too much, hope we can make a deal.

lmk prices
